cast.name: 斯维特兰娜·泽连科夫斯卡娅 Svetlana Zelenkovskaya

introduction: A long time ago in a galaxy on the planet Earth lived professor. He worked at the Science City Ishtyme , lost among the expanses of the Siberian taiga . The idea of the design of the universe haunted professor and was the subject of his scientific research . And once, in 2221 , visited his insight, and he made a discovery that turns upside down all the textbook representation of the structure of our universe.But unkindly upon this discovery envious fellow scientists from the world community. However, there were also people who believed the light of scientific thought professors , not only gave him money and helped build the first in the history of creation of a new type of space ship to travel through the corridors of the universe , so that he could prove his loyalty to his professor of the theory ! And going back in Ishtyme heroic crew - designer - pilot, the professor , the navigator , the producer of the expedition with an assistant, chef, doctor and head of security , to take a full of mysteries way through the intricacies of the star pile , searching for answers to various questions , and where they will find one God , and the other will be rewarded on merit ...
